name: Raindrop
natural_language_description: 这是 Raindrop 节点。主要用于: Consume the Raindrop API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: collection

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

collectionId.name: collectionId
collectionId.description: The ID of the collection to update
collectionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Collection ID | 作用: The ID of the collection to update | (必填项)

link.name: link
link.description: Link of the bookmark to be created
link.natural_language_description: 参数名: Link | 作用: Link of the bookmark to be created | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: collectionId (值: None) - It's possible to restrict remove action to just one collection. It's optional. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

bookmarkId.name: bookmarkId
bookmarkId.description: The ID of the bookmark to update
bookmarkId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Bookmark ID | 作用: The ID of the bookmark to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 5

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: cover (值: None) - Name of the binary property containing the data for the image to upload as a cover
public (值: None) - Whether the collection will be accessible without authentication
parentId (值: None) - ID of this collection's parent collection, if it is a child collection
sort (值: None) - Descending sort order of this collection. The number is the position of the collection among all the collections with the same parent ID.
title (值: None) - Title of the collection to update
view (值: None) - View style of this collection

title.name: title
title.description: Title of the collection to create
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Title of the collection to create | (必填项)

type.name: type
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 默认值: parent | (必填项)

tags.name: tags
tags.description: One or more tags to delete. Enter comma-separated values to delete multiple tags.
tags.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tags | 作用: One or more tags to delete. Enter comma-separated values to delete multiple tags. | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: collectionId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

self.name: self
self.description: Whether to return details on the logged-in user
self.natural_language_description: 参数名: Self | 作用: Whether to return details on the logged-in user | 默认值: True | (必填项)

userId.name: userId
userId.description: The ID of the user to retrieve
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: The ID of the user to retrieve | (必填项)
